Cynthia "Cindy" Adams (née Sugar; later Heller; born April 24, 1930) is an American gossip columnist and writer. She is the widow of comedian/humorist Joey Adams. She was born in New York City.
She began to work as a photographer's model in Manhattan. Since 1979, Adams has written a gossip column for the "New York Post", a New York City newspaper. She also contributed to "Sunday Today in New York". Adams became a syndicated newspaper columnist in 1981.
